submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList
import numpy as np

class Solution:
    def getResults(self, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[bool]:
        MX = min(50000, len(queries) * 3)
        a = np.zeros(MX, np.int32)
        res = []
        sl = SortedList([0])
        for t in queries:
            if t[0] == 1:
                x = t[1]
                i = sl.bisect_left(x)
                left = sl[i - 1]
                a[left:x] = x - left
                if i < len(sl):
                    right = sl[i]
                    a[x:right] = right - x
                sl.add(x)
            else:
                x, sz = t[1], t[2]
                i = sl.bisect_right(x)
                left = sl[i - 1]
                mx = 0
                if left > 0: mx = max(mx, a[:left].max())
                if x > left: mx = max(mx, x - left)
                res.append(bool(mx >= sz))
        return res
